desc: Loot Vault offers you previous crate items, bundles and the best exclusive geek & gaming apparel, collectibles, gear & more, right from the source, Loot Crate!

layout.text: From time-to-time, we open the Loot Vault to provide exclusive, limited-time access to select favorite items from some of our past crates. Sign up for LootCrate.com emails to get updates for the next Loot Vault exclusive offer! If you're looking for information about your Build-A-Crate order, please contact our support team and we will be happy to help!
